author: Reuters Editorial
title: Berkshire Hathaway Dissolves Most Of Its Share Stake In IBM
text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Berkshire Hathaway:
* UPS SHARE STAKE IN APPLE BY 23.3 PERCENT TO 165.3 MILLION SHARES - SEC FILING
* UPS SHARE STAKE IN BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON BY 21.1 PERCENT TO 60.8 MILLION SHARES - SEC FILING
* CUTS SHARE STAKE IN INTERNATIONAL BUSINESS MACHINES BY 94.5% TO 2.05 MILLION SHARES
* CHANGE IN HOLDINGS ARE AS OF DEC 31, 2017 AND COMPARED WITH THE PREVIOUS QUARTER ENDED AS OF SEPT 30, 2017 Source for the quarter ended Dec. 31, 2017: ( bit.ly/2nZHhYc ) Source for the quarter ended Sept. 30, 2017: ( bit.ly/2nH0Ggu )
